page.title: 12ADVENTURE EDUCATION WEEK 1
page.content: The 3rd and 4th years each year go on an{Outdoor Education Week.}This year we went to{St.Just in Roseland.}We stayed in the old school there. One afternoon we went down to the beach and did a{beach study.}Three ladies from the {Cornwall Conservation Trust came to help us.We found lots of different seaweeds and looked up their names.Here are some of them: Bladder Wrack,Toothed Wrack, Twisted Wrack, Channelled Wrack, Egg Wrack,Lettuce Wrack and Enteromorpha. We looked under lots of stones and found many animals.We saw crabs and found what is called a butter fish.We had to obey one rule - always to put stones back where we found them,so we did not destroy any animal's home.
